noun.definition: An optical instrument used to view distant objects
noun.example: He used a telescope to observe the stars.

verb.definition: To compress or condense in size or scope
verb.example: The meeting times were telescoped into one afternoon.

verb.definition: To fit or slide one part into another, like a telescope
verb.example: The chair legs can telescope for easy storage.

usage_examples: She telescoped the instructions to fit them on a single page.
